text: Qualification for boccia at the 2020 Summer Paralympics begin from 1 January 2018 to 31 December 2019. Individual World Ranking List slots are allocated to the individual athlete not to the NPC. * An NPC can allocated one pair or team in a BC1/BC2 team, BC3 or BC4 pairs events. * An NPC can qualify a maximum of two athletes per individual medal event. * In each pair or team event, an NPC must have at least one female athlete in their pair or team. ==Entry systems== ===Individuals=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! !!
